body_html:
@jsimsa

Hi Jiri,

Could please kindly wait for a while to close this issue? Or at least wait for our confirmation?

As mentioned in this post, we are already working on some PR preparation based on our observation.
If it is possible, any deeper interaction would be highly appreciated. Otherwise, we may do some duplicated work. That's why we raise what we observe as early as possible.

Based on your closing this issue so quickly without any specific input, frankly speaking, we are not sure whether we should go on with our work about the auto-tuning enhancement or not.

I think if Google wants to get more input from the community, maybe the interaction could be deeper.

Thanks

body:
@jsimsa 

Hi Jiri,

Could please kindly wait for a while to close this issue? Or at least wait for our confirmation?

As mentioned in this post, we are already working on some PR preparation based on our observation. 
If it is possible, any deeper interaction would be highly appreciated. Otherwise, we may do some duplicated work. That's why we raise what we observe as early as possible. 

Based on your closing this issue so quickly without any specific input, frankly speaking, we are not sure whether we should go on with our work about the auto-tuning enhancement or not. 

I think if Google wants to get more input from the community, maybe the interaction could be deeper.

Thanks
